articles.description: Honda India has decided to showcase a new motorcycle to Indian customers. The brand has placed one CB500F at its Bangalore BigWing Dealerships.
articles.content:
-         New CB500F showcased in India 
-         Displayed at Bigwing Bangalore 
-         May launch in India
